en.bdb: After discharging many arrows, Krishna spoke again, “O Amit Singh! your false ego with be effacted.”1246.

ss.gurmukhi: hy Aimt isMG! (qUM) imt jweyWgw, qyrw AiBmwn JUTw hY ]1246]
